position: Software Engineer III, Machine Learning, Google Cloud Performance
name: Google
description: Google is hiring a software engineer with a Bachelor's degree and 2 years of experience in software development and machine learning, preferring candidates with a Master's or PhD in Computer Science, experience with large scale systems data analysis and developing accessible technologies, to develop the next-generation technologies, manage project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables, and participate in design reviews with peers and stakeholders, offering a salary range of $136,000-$200,000 plus bonus, equity, and benefits.
